description: This file defines React components for a custom scroll area and scrollbar using primitives from @radix-ui/react-scroll-area. It provides a styled, reusable scroll area component with customizable scrollbar orientation.

methods.name: scrollArea
methods.description: A React component that renders a styled scroll area with viewport and scrollbar elements, accepting ref forwarding and custom class names.

methods.name: ScrollBar
methods.description: A React component that renders a styled scrollbar with configurable orientation, accepting ref forwarding and custom class names.
